scripts.start: concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names watch-server,watch-server2,watch-client-node,watch-client-static,watch-client2-node,watch-client2-static  "yarn run watch-server" "yarn run watch-server2" "yarn run watch-client-node" "yarn run watch-client-static" "yarn run watch-client2-node" "yarn run watch-client2-static"
scripts.watch-client-static: cd client && yarn install && yarn start
scripts.watch-client2-static: cd client2 && yarn install && yarn start
